CONTENT: あっつー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So hot!

CONTENT: もう すっかり夏だねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Summer's in full swing, huh?

CONTENT: ですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Very much so!

CONTENT: 後藤さんの家 あと少しで着くみたいです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La casa de Goto está cerca.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think we're almost at Gotoh-san's house.

CONTENT: やったー　っていうか 道案内ありがとね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Great! Thanks for showing me around, by the way.

CONTENT: いえいえ 楽しみですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not at all! I'm really looking forward to this!

CONTENT: うん! なんか新鮮だよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah! It'll be such a new experience!

CONTENT: ほら あたしたち　STARRY以外で会うこと ほとんどないしさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Prácticamente no nos vemos fuera del Starry.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean, we mainly only get together at Starry, right?

CONTENT: ですね!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes!

CONTENT: 後藤さんの家って どんな感じなんでしょうね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wonder what Gotoh-san's house is like!

CONTENT: ああ 前に 段ボールが狭くて　家の感じに似てるから落ち着く... 的なことは言ってたな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dijo que las cajas la calmaban porque le recordaban a su casa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She said something about a cramped cardboard box reminding her of home...

CONTENT: えっ 段ボールに似てる家って...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Su casa se parece a una caja?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A house like a cardboard box?

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃんって ホント 言うこと面白いよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan says the funniest things, huh?

CONTENT: 楽しみだなー　楽しみですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't wait! Neither can I!

CONTENT: 私 お菓子とお勧めの映画 持ってきましたよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Traje algo para comer y una película.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I brought some sweets and a movie I like.

CONTENT: ちょっと 今日の目的 忘れたの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey! You didn't forget why we're doing this, did you?

CONTENT: もちろん覚えてますよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, I remember!

CONTENT: ライブで着るTシャツのデザイン 考えるんですよね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A pensar en un diseño para nuestras camisetas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're designing T-shirts for our concert, right?

CONTENT: そう!　リョウ先輩も来ればよかったのに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah! I wish Ryo-senpai could've come too...

CONTENT: 誘ったんだけどね...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I did invite her, but...

CONTENT: おばあちゃんが 今夜が峠なんだって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dice que su abuela no pasa de esta noche.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She says her grandma took a turn for the worse.

CONTENT: えっ! 大丈夫なんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is she all right?!

CONTENT: 大丈夫 大丈夫
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, she's fine.

CONTENT: おばあちゃんの峠 今年で10回目だから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es la décima vez que dice lo mismo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is like the tenth critical time for her grandma this year.

CONTENT: 今のギターの入り方 いい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La entrada de la guitarra es genial.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I love the way the guitar comes in here.

CONTENT: それって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You mean...

CONTENT: おばあちゃんは まだ実在してるからいいよ　いや よくないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al menos su abuela existe. Pero sigue estando mal.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean, at least her grandma really exists. That's a heckuva low bar.

CONTENT: この前なんて クラスの子に 放課後 遊ぼうって誘われたとき...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando unas de la clase la invitaron a salir...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Once, when some classmates invited her to hang out with them...

CONTENT: ごめん　愛犬のぺスが 手術することになって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo siento, tienen que operar a mi perrita Peth.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry, my dog Pe'z has to have surgery.

CONTENT: えっ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?!

CONTENT: って! 犬なんて 一度も飼ったことないのに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y ella nunca ha tenido ningún perro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So she said, but she's never even had a dog.

CONTENT: 飼ってないんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She hasn't?

CONTENT: そうだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She hasn't!

CONTENT: ほかにも 生き別れの双子の妹から 連絡が来たとか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Otra vez dijo que la había llamado su gemela perdida
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then there's \"I just got a call from my twin sister separated at birth,\"

CONTENT: お父さんが事故で 記憶喪失になったとか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: o que su papá estaba amnésico tras un accidente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and \"my dad was in a car crash, and now he has amnesia.\"

CONTENT: しょうもない言い訳を...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just all the silliest excuses...

CONTENT: そんなスラスラと　バラエティ豊富なウソが 思いつくなんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Se inventa mentiras de película como si nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm impressed by how easily she comes up with such a wide range of lies.

CONTENT: さすが先輩 悪女で すてき!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Senpai's amazing! I love me a bad girl!

CONTENT: リョウ狂いも ここまでくると...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's a serious Ryo obsession right there.

CONTENT: 着きました! ここです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're here! This is it!

CONTENT: えっ? ここ... だよね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This... is it, isn't it?

CONTENT: \"結束バンド\"って 書いてあるもんね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It... does say \"Kessoku Band,\" right?

CONTENT: 後藤さんの家って　旅館でしたっけ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did she mention her house was a ryokan?

CONTENT: 知らないけど　どっからどう見ても 普通の一軒家だね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ni idea. Pero parece una casa normal.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not sure. It just looks like a normal house to me.

CONTENT: ですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah.

CONTENT: とりあえず!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyway...

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃん 来たよー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're here, Bocchi-chan!

CONTENT: こんにちはー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hello!

CONTENT: あっ ああ いいい... 今 開けまーす!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C-Coming!

CONTENT: イ... イエーイ!　ウェ ウェウェ... ウェルカーム!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yaaaay! W-W-Welcome!

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃん 楽しそうだね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you having fun, Bocchi-chan?

CONTENT: あっ はい...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yeah...

CONTENT: スス... スベった!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I b-b-bombed...

CONTENT: なんだか うれしいですね!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Isn't that nice?

CONTENT: 後藤さんも 今日 楽しみにしてくれてたって分かって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es bueno saber que también te hacía ilusión.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san's made it clear how much she's been looking forward to this too!

CONTENT: 喜多さんの優しさが スベった心にしみる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La amabilidad de Kita es como sal en la herida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kita-san knows the kindest words to soothe my bombed soul.

CONTENT: ど... どうぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C-Come in.

CONTENT: はーい　おじゃましますー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay! Coming in!

CONTENT: 後藤さん これ お土産
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san, these are for you.

CONTENT: ご家族で召し上がってね　あっ えっ? あ... ありがとうございます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Compártelo con tu familia. Muchas gracias.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please enjoy them with your family. Wh-What? Th-Thank you...

CONTENT: うわあー 紙袋から　お... おしゃれな何かが あふれ出てる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La bolsa desprende un aura moderna.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, t-trendiness emanates from the bag!

CONTENT: 映画もありますよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I brought a movie, too!

CONTENT: だからー　ライブのTシャツデザイン 考えるんでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya te dije que vinimos a diseñar las camisetas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I told you, we have to figure out our T-shirt design for the concert!

CONTENT: バラバラの服より おそろいのほうが　一体感? バンド感?　そういうの出るんじゃない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si vamos todas iguales, quedará más unificado. Así pareceremos más una banda, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Rather than just wearing whatever, wouldn't having matching outfits create a sense of one-ness? A sense of band-ness?! Am I wrong here?

CONTENT: それに...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Besides...

CONTENT: 全然 結束感ねえな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's nothing tying you guys together.

CONTENT: とか 絶対言われるし! うん うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I know that's what she'll say!

CONTENT: 分かった? こ... こっちです　遊びに来たんじゃないんだからね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You get it? We're not here to play around! Th-This way...

CONTENT: す... すみません 全部 片づけますね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I'm sorry. I'll put it all away.

CONTENT: ああっ やっぱり ちょっとは遊ぼうかな!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: W-Well, we could play around a little!

CONTENT: はい 賛成です!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, I'd love that!

CONTENT: じゃ... じゃあ 飲み物 取ってきます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: W-Well then, I'll fetch the drinks.

CONTENT: 楽にしててください
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please make yourselves at home.

CONTENT: ありがとう!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks!

CONTENT: それにしても すごい飾りつけだね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But wow, she really went all-out with the decorations!

CONTENT: でも ギターとか エフェクター 何もありませんね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero no veo ni guitarras ni pedales de efectos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's nothing here besides the guitar and effects unit, though.

CONTENT: だね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah...

CONTENT: 私 勝手に もう少し　ロックな感じの 部屋してるのかと思って...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me imaginaba una habitación más rockera.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just assumed her room would have a bit more of a rock feel toー

CONTENT: これは ロック?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this... rock?

CONTENT: うん... ロックしてるね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, it's pretty rock!

CONTENT: ほ... ほかには ロックなところ あるかなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I w-wonder if there's anything else rock about iー

CONTENT: イタッ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ow!

CONTENT: あっ あれ?　なんで こんなに アー写がたくさん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Why does she have so many copies of our ProPho?

CONTENT: ううっ 分からないけど　なんか めちゃめちゃロックな気がする...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No lo sé, pero es muy rockero.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't know what's going on, but it seems pretty darn rock!

CONTENT: でっかいのもあるよ　ひっ... ひいーっ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's got blown-up ones too!

CONTENT: この写真 部屋に いーっぱい貼ってたんだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las tenía pegadas por la habitación.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She had this picture stuck up all over her room.

CONTENT: すっごく気に入った写真なんだって　え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She said she really liked it!

CONTENT: でも お母さんに　目がチカチカするから はがしなさいって止められたの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mamá le dijo que las quitara porque hacen daño a la vista.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But Mom told her to take them down because they were hurting her eyes.

CONTENT: あと そっちの お札とかは　お姉ちゃんが この前 お化けに取りつかれたから　貼ってあるんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ah, y ese sello es porque la poseyó un espíritu.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And we put those seals up when Sis was possessed before!

CONTENT: 以上 説明おしまい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That should just about cover it!

CONTENT: もしかして 後藤さんの妹?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, are you Gotoh-san's sister?

CONTENT: はい! はじめまして 後藤ふたりです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes! A pleasure to meet you. I'm Futari Gotoh.

CONTENT: 犬はジミヘン
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The dog's Jimihen.

CONTENT: む... 麦茶でよかったのかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I hope barley tea's okay.

CONTENT: もっと おしゃれな飲み物のほうが...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Or would they prefer a trendier drink?

CONTENT: かわいいー! え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So cute!

CONTENT: あっ 皆さん お待たせしまし...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry to keep you guys waー

CONTENT: ねえ ギターで むによんずの歌 弾いて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Toca la canción de los Munions.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, will you play the Munions song on guitar?

CONTENT: じゃあ 今度来るときまでに 練習しとくね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Practicaré para el próximo día que venga.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll practice so I can do it the next time I come by.

CONTENT: 絶対だよ! 次 いつ来る?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You gotta! When's the next time you come by?

CONTENT: こ... これは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-Is this...

CONTENT: アハッ ジミヘンは人懐っこいね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Jimihen's a friendly little guy!

CONTENT: すっ すす... すっかり打ち解けて　わわ... 私の入る隙がない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Se hicieron amigos y ya no hay sitio para mí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Th-They're getting along so well, there's no room left for me...

CONTENT: あれ ぼっちちゃん?　後藤さん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Bocchi-chan? Gotoh-san?

CONTENT: 5歳児と犬以下のコミュ力...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Soy peor que una niña y un perro!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A five-year-old and a dog have better social skills than me.

CONTENT: あっ お姉ちゃん また固まってる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sis is frozen up again.

CONTENT: ふ... ふたり ななな... なんで ここにいるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: F-Futari. Wh-What are you doing here?

CONTENT: お母さんたちは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wh-Where are Mom and Dad?

CONTENT: お買い物
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shopping.

CONTENT: お... お姉ちゃん 今から大事な お話するから　ジミヘンと遊んでてね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tenemos que hablar de algo importante. Ve a jugar con Jimi Hen.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I-I've got grown-up things to talk about, so please go play with Jimihen.

CONTENT: えっ つまんないー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Aw, no fun!

CONTENT: 私は別に ふたりちゃんがいても大丈夫よ　うん あたしも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por mí, puede quedarse. -Por mí, también.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't mind having Futari-chan here. Yeah, same!

CONTENT: ダダダダダ... ダメです　い... 妹いたら は... はっちゃけられないので!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, no, no. Si se queda, no podré soltarme.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Y-Y-You can't! I c-c-can't whoop it up if my sister's here!

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃん　あたしらの前で はっちゃけてたんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan, you've been whooping it up with us all this time?

CONTENT: お願いします!　ジミヘンと遊んでいてください!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por favor, ve a jugar con Jimi Hen.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I beg of you! Please go play with Jimihen!

CONTENT: 冷凍庫のアイス 食べていいから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can have an ice pop from the freezer.

CONTENT: もう しょうがないなあー　ワン ワン ワン!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, it is what it is!

CONTENT: 姉妹 仲良しなのね ウフフッ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You've got such a sisterly bond!

CONTENT: えっ? 今のやりとりの どこで それ感じた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How did you get that from what just happened?

CONTENT: それじゃ Tシャツのデザイン 決めよう!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Decidamos el diseño de las camisetas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, let's design those T-shirts!

CONTENT: みんなは これに自由に描いて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Feel free to use these!

CONTENT: はーい はい...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay! Okay...

CONTENT: 無難に ロゴTでもいいんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Podría tener el logo y ya,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We could just slap our logo on there,

CONTENT: そのままグッズにして 物販で売りたいと思ってるし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but I'd love to sell the shirts as merch, too!

CONTENT: に... 虹夏ちゃん 物販に貪欲
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es muy ambiciosa con el merch.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: N-Nijika-chan is so hungry for merch!

CONTENT: みんなから それ以上に いい案が出たら採用しますので
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si se nos ocurre algo mejor, usaremos eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So if you have any other great ideas, I might use those as well!

CONTENT: よーし 後藤さん 頑張りましょう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay! Let's do our best, Gotoh-san!

CONTENT: は... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right!

CONTENT: たまには みんなに いいとこ見せないと!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Les demostraré que sirvo para algo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have to impress the others for once!

CONTENT: その格好で 真面目な顔するのやめてー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No pongas cara seria con esa pinta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C'mon, take that stuff off before you try to look serious!

CONTENT: えっ ホントに遊びに来てる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? They really came?

CONTENT: ホントのホントに?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Really? For real?

CONTENT: ワン うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah!

CONTENT: お姉ちゃんの妄想じゃなくて?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí. -¿No es la imaginación de tu hermana?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: These friends aren't just the imaginary kind?

CONTENT: ワンワン うんうん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, yeah!

CONTENT: フフッ 出来ました!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All done!

CONTENT: おっ どんなの どんなの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let me see!

CONTENT: コンセプトは 友情 努力 勝利でーす
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The concept is friendship, effort, and victory!

CONTENT: 体育祭で見るやつ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not a dang sports festival!

CONTENT: ええー?　かわいくないですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Aw, but I think it's cute!

CONTENT: 待って 優勝って何?　ライブに そんな概念ないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y de qué victoria hablas? Damos conciertos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hang on. What are we winning at? I'm not sure how \"victory\" applies to a concert...

CONTENT: んっとー ノリです　ノリ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... vibes! Vibes?

CONTENT: だって こういうの着たら　みんなの心が ひとつになる気がしません?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si nos ponemos algo así, nuestros corazones serán uno.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just think wearing these would really get us feeling like a unit!

CONTENT: ねえ? 後藤さ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right, Gotoh-saー

CONTENT: ク... クラス 一致団結!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C-Class unity...

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃん 体育祭に相当なトラウマが?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan! Is the idea of a sports festival that traumatic for you?!

CONTENT: 体育祭 それは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El festival deportivo. El evento escolar traumático número uno para introvertidos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The sports festival: the number one-source of school trauma for introverts.

CONTENT: 運動のできない者は煙たがられ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A heinous ritual in which those with no athletic ability are shunned,

CONTENT: 存在価値を奪われる 忌まわしき祭典!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y te despojan de todo tu valor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and even their right to exist is stripped away.

CONTENT: 授業内だけでなく放課後も

CONTENT: ひとりは みんなのために!
みんなは ひとりのために!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La tortura de que te obliguen a vivir por el festival durante un mes.

後藤さん 溶けちゃいましたね

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It sure is hot today!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wow, this week's Bocchi Time lasted through the whole commercial break!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did I do something wrong?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? Come back, Gotoh-san!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A place in which introverts are constantly underfoot,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si esperamos en un rincón, nos critican por no colaborar.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No cooperation, no life! No cooperation, no life!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hello!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks for having us!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Isn't it wonderful?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Eat your fill, all right?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You let Hitori join your band, right?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Really?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: See? Music really brings people together! Right, Jimihen?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here, it's done.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wow, that looks good!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kita-chan, eat! Okay!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando nos dijo que vendría alguien,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When she said she had friends coming,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pensé que solo eran imaginaciones suyas,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I assumed they were imaginary or hallucinations,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hallucinations?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Software?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, okay.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Admito que sería capaz de hacerlo,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't say it doesn't sound like something I'd do...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero me duele que tengan esa imagen de mí.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C-Cut it out already!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan! We're running out of time! Snap out of it!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's so...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C-Cute!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, hang on!

CONTENT: 新しいギタリスト 探さないとですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'll have to find a new guitarist.

CONTENT: ぐうっ! あっ 先輩 どうしました?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Senpai! What's wrong?

CONTENT: 急に めまいが...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm suddenly so dizzy...

CONTENT: な... なんか急に この部屋 ジメジメしてきて　酸素 薄くなったみたいな...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El ambiente está muy pesado, como si no hubiera oxígeno.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The room is so damp all of a sudden, like all the air's been sucked out of it...

CONTENT: うっ... 肺に入った!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I breathed it in!

CONTENT: あっ やだ 私も
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: S-So did I!

CONTENT: うぐっ ダメだ... 力が抜けていく...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-It's no use. G-Going limp...

CONTENT: 後藤さんの呪い... だわ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this... Gotoh-san's curse?

CONTENT: みんな デザート食べない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Would anyone like dessert?

CONTENT: 喜多ちゃんが 持ってきてくれたスイーツを...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tenemos los dulces que trajo Kita.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We've got the sweets Kita-chan broughtー

CONTENT: いつも明るさだけで 乗り越えようとして すみません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Perdón por intentar superarlo todo con optimismo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry for trying to push through everything with positivity.

CONTENT: ギター うまくならなくて ごめんなさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Perdón por no mejorar con la guitarra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry I couldn't get good at guitar.

CONTENT: かわいすぎて ごめんなさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry for being too cute.

CONTENT: アハハハッ みんな お姉ちゃんみたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're all acting like Sis!

CONTENT: あっ お父さん 塩とお札!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dear, the salt and the seals!

CONTENT: れ... 霊媒師さん呼ぶ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Should I call that exorcist?

CONTENT: なんでだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why?

CONTENT: そんなわけで　いい案が出なかったので
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como al final no se nos ocurrió nada excepcional,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And so... Since nobody had any good ideas,

CONTENT: Tシャツは あたしの案になりました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: we're going with my T-shirt design!

CONTENT: じゃじゃーん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ta-dah.

CONTENT: すてき!　これ 伊地知先輩が 作ったんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I love it! Did you make this, Ijichi-senpai?!

CONTENT: あたし デザインとか得意なのだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Se me da bien diseñar cosas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm pretty good at the design stuff!

CONTENT: なら 最初から　虹夏ちゃんがデザインすれば よかったのでは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pues podrías haberla diseñado tú desde el principio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then why didn't you just design it from the start?

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan.

CONTENT: なら 最初から　虹夏ちゃんがデザインすれば よかったのでは?　とでも言いたげな目だね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: \"Pues podrías haberla diseñado tú desde el principio\". Pareces querer decirme eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You look like you were just thinking, \"Then why didn't you just design it from the start?\"

CONTENT: エ... エスパー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sh-She's psychic!

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃんの考えてること　だんだんと 分かるようになってきたかもー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cada vez entiendo mejor cómo piensas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm getting pretty good at guessing what you're thinking lately!

CONTENT: いいねー 出てるよ 結束感!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Awesome! Our ties feel so much stronger now!

CONTENT: うん すごくいいですよ これ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, I love it!

CONTENT: あと モデルがいいから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The quality of the model helps.

CONTENT: ですよねー 先輩 目線こっちでーす!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Totally! Senpai, look right here!

CONTENT: これは これでいいかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Supongo que esto no esta mal.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is pretty good, though.

CONTENT: あさってはライブ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Two days to our concert.

CONTENT: 4人で頑張ってきた結果が ついに...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And we worked hard to make our ties feel...

CONTENT: なんか今 台風来てるみたいですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Parece que se acerca un tifón.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, looks like there's a typhoon on the way.

CONTENT: ええーっ! ウソでしょ?　そんなの出てなかったよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No way! This is the first I've heard of it!

CONTENT: 夏の天気は気まぐれ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El tiempo es así de voluble.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Summer weather is so fickle.

CONTENT: マジかー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Seriously?

CONTENT: じゃ... じゃあ ライブは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: B-But what about the concert?

CONTENT: てるてる坊主 作る?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Should we make rain charms?

CONTENT: それだ! 作るしかない　1人 ノルマ10個!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Exacto! Será lo mejor. Diez cada una.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah! That's our only choice! Your quota is ten each!

CONTENT: は... はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right!

CONTENT: あっ でも 関東には当たらないみたいです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Parece que no pasará por Kanto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, it looks like it won't hit the Kanto region, though.

CONTENT: えっ そうなの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, really?

CONTENT: なーんだ よかったー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whew, that's a relief!

CONTENT: 本番 楽しみですね うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't wait for the show! Yeah.

CONTENT: 新曲 結構いい感じになってきたよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La canción nueva está quedando muy bien.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think the new song's coming together pretty well!

CONTENT: あっ あの... ですよね!　みんな かっこいいです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah! We're all sounding awesome!

CONTENT: よーし じゃあ 練習始めようか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, let's get practicing!

CONTENT: あの!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Excuse me!

CONTENT: ねねね... 念のために つ... 作りませんか?　てるてる坊主!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sh-Shouldn't we still make the rain charms? Just to be safe?

CONTENT: そうだね 念には念を　ですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, sure! Better safe than sorry, right? Totally!

CONTENT: あたし 道具持ってくるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll bring in what we need to make them.

CONTENT: は... はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: O-Okay!

CONTENT: てるてる坊主作るの小学生ぶり...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hace mucho que no hago uno.

CONTENT: 私がネガティブだから　良くない方向に考えちゃうけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo soy pesimista, por eso siempre pienso lo peor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm used to being negative, so I always assume the worst, but...

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃん 大丈夫?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You okay, Bocchi-chan?

CONTENT: ははは... はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Y-Y-Y-Yes!

CONTENT: 大丈夫... だよね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It'll be okay... I think.

CONTENT: 台風8号は 予想外の進路を取っており...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El tifón número ocho ha cambiado de dirección.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Typhoon #8 has taken an unexpected course...
